a1: HEX (#RRGGBB), RGB, HSL, HWB, and CMYK. All values update simultaneously when you change the color.
q2: How accurate is the CMYK conversion?
a2: The conversion uses standard mathematical formulas. For print-accurate CMYK, use ICC color profiles in professional software.
q3: Can I enter RGB values directly?
a3: Currently input is via HEX or the color picker. RGB and other formats are shown as output that you can copy.
